item.title: "Survivor" cast includes "The White Lotus" creator Mike White for 50th season
item.description: "CBS Mornings" exclusively reveals the cast for the 50th season of "Survivor" featuring fan favorites as returning players.

item.title: Here's the top predictor of financial well-being, researchers say
item.description: It doesn't take $1 million to secure a sense of financial well-being, according to new research from Vanguard.

item.title: GameStop purchases $500 million in bitcoin in first crypto push
item.description: GameStop, an ailing video game retailer and "meme stock," is pushing into the cryptocurrency sector.

item.title: Spelling bee spotlight sparks debate over English's quirks
item.description: Author Gabe Henry's new book "Enough is ENUF" makes the case that English spelling is more confusing than it needs to be.

item.title: Lizzy McAlpine talks Broadway debut and TikTok success
item.description: Platinum-selling artist Lizzy McAlpine sits down with Anthony Mason to discuss her viral song "Spring Into Summer," her path to pop stardom and her lo...
